controllers

Class MechanicController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.UserController
      • controllers.MechanicController

  • public class MechanicController
extends UserController
    Class used to form a link between the user interface and the Mechanic class.

      • getTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTasks()
        Returns the list of tasks the current mechanic can perform with numbering.
        Returns:
        Null if the mechanic is null. The list of tasks the mechanic can perform with numbering otherwise.

      • getTaskInformation

        public java.lang.String getTaskInformation(java.lang.String taskName)
        Returns the task information for the given task.
        Parameters:
        taskName - The task for which the information needs to be returned.
        Returns:
        Returns null if: - the mechanic is null - the given task name does not correspond with any of the tasks of the workstation Returns the task information otherwise.

      • doTask

        public void doTask(java.lang.String taskName)
        Performs the given task if the current mechanic is not null.
        Parameters:
        taskName - The name of the task that needs to be performed.

        public void setWorkStation(java.lang.String workstationName)
        Sets the workstation for the current mechanic to the given workstation.
        Parameters:
        workstationName - The new workstation for the current mechanic.
